amendment.description: Amendment prevents federal agencies from requiring contractors to sign an anti-competitive and costly project labor agreement (PLA) as a condition of winning a federal construction contract.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 112-485 to prevent federal agencies from requiring contractors to sign an anti-competitive and costly project labor agreement (PLA) as a condition of winning a federal construction contract.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 209 (Roll no. 267).
